title: Cindy Lou
description: A farmer needed to sell one of his cows because he needed money to fix up his farm but he didn't want to do so. His favorite cow Cindy Lou started giving chocolate milk. Newspapermen came. Cindy Lou got angry because it was too noisy and she stopped giving milk. The journalists felt sorry and they sent the farmer some money. Cindy Lou went back to giving regular white milk. So the farmer did not have to sell Cindy Lou after all.
author: Sonia Fox
